mapper.select: SELECT id, username, nick_name, mobile, gender, avatar, email, STATUS, dept_id FROM yja_user WHERE id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0

SELECT t1.id userId, t1.username, t1.nick_name, t1.PASSWORD, t1.STATUS, t1.dept_id , t3.roleno FROM yja_user t1 LEFT JOIN yja_user_role t2 ON t2.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN yja_role t3 ON t3.id = t2.role_id WHERE t1.userid = #{username} AND t1.deleted=0

SELECT u.username, u.nick_name, u.mobile, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 2 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END gender, d.NAME AS dept_name, u.created_time FROM yja_user u LEFT JOIN yja_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id
u.deleted = 0 AND u.username != 'root'
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') OR u.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') OR u.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%'))
AND u.status = #{status}
AND concat(',',concat(d.tree_path,',',d.id),',') like concat('%,',#{deptId},',%')
GROUP BY u.id
